price: Dan semua kisah dari rasul-rasul Kami ceritakan kepadamu ialah kisah-kisah yang dengannya Kami teguhkan hatimu dan dalam surah ini telah datang kepadamu kebenaran serta pengajaran dan peringatan bagi orang-orang yang beriman.
arabic: وَكُلّٗا نَّقُصُّ عَلَيۡكَ مِنۡ أَنۢبَآءِ ٱلرُّسُلِ مَا نُثَبِّتُ بِهِۦ فُؤَادَكَۚ وَجَآءَكَ فِي هَٰذِهِ ٱلۡحَقُّ وَمَوۡعِظَةٞ وَذِكۡرَىٰ لِلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wakullan naquṣṣu ʿalayka min anbāi al-rusuli mā nuthabbitu bihi fuādaka wajāaka fī hādhihi al-ḥaqu wamawʿiẓatun wadhik'rā lil'mu'minīna
